title: Two-Factor Authentication
description: Add an extra layer of security to your account

enable.description: Protect your account with two-factor authentication

setup.title: Set Up Two-Factor Authentication
setup.description: Use an authenticator app to generate verification codes

step1.title: Step 1: Install an Authenticator App
step1.description: Download Google Authenticator, Authy, or any TOTP-compatible app

step2.title: Step 2: Scan QR Code
step2.description: Open your authenticator app and scan this QR code

manualEntry.title: Can't scan?
manualEntry.description: Enter this code manually in your authenticator app:

step3.title: Step 3: Verify
step3.description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app

confirm.title: Save Your Backup Codes
confirm.description: These codes can be used to access your account if you lose your authenticator device. Each code can only be used once.
confirm.warning: Store these codes in a safe place. You won't be able to see them again!
confirm.continueWarning: Make sure you've saved your backup codes before continuing

verify.title: Two-Factor Authentication
verify.description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
verify.backupCodeDescription: Enter one of your backup codes

disable.title: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
disable.description: This will make your account less secure. Are you sure?
disable.warning: After disabling 2FA, anyone with your password can access your account.
disable.enterCode: Enter your current authenticator code to confirm

backupCodes.title: Backup Codes
backupCodes.description: Use these codes if you lose access to your authenticator app
backupCodes.regenerateDescription: This will invalidate all existing backup codes

required.title: Two-Factor Authentication Required
required.description: Your account requires two-factor authentication to be enabled for security purposes.

errors.codeInvalid: Invalid verification code. Please try again.
errors.codeTooManyAttempts: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later.
errors.tokenInvalid: Invalid or expired authentication token. Please log in again.
errors.tokenExpired: Authentication token has expired. Please log in again.
errors.setupFailed: Failed to start 2FA setup. Please try again.
